content.question: Using the source, respond to parts A, B, C, and D. Describe one claim the King of Kongo makes in his letter.Describe one similarity or difference between the Kingdom of Kongo and another Sudanic empire between the thirteenth and sixteenth centuries.Explain how interactions with Portugal affected the Kingdom of Kongo in the sixteenth through eighteenth centuries.Explain how religious traditions of Afro-descendants in the Americas were affected by interactions with other cultures in the eighteenth through twentieth centuries.

frqParts.text: Using the source, respond to parts A, B, C, and D. Describe one claim the King of Kongo makes in his letter.Describe one similarity or difference between the Kingdom of Kongo and another Sudanic empire between the thirteenth and sixteenth centuries.Explain how interactions with Portugal affected the Kingdom of Kongo in the sixteenth through eighteenth centuries.Explain how religious traditions of Afro-descendants in the Americas were affected by interactions with other cultures in the eighteenth through twentieth centuries.

topic.text: 1.5: The Sudanic Empires: Ghana, Mali, and Songhai

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
